album.title: UTA'S SONGS ONE PIECE FILM RED

wiki.summary: Where the Wind Blows is a song by Ado and an insert song in the movie One Piece Film: Red and the seventh track on her One Piece Album . The song is a collaboration between the singer Ado and the singer-songwriter Motohiro Hata with Toei Animation (The Animation Studio for One Piece) doing the official music video. The song serves not only as an insert for the film and one of the last tracks of the album, but it is the closing song for the film as well as being played in episode 1029 of the One Piece anime. Read more on Last.fm.
